participant_1.name: Alex
participant_1.personality: Thoughtful and introspective, often reflecting on personal challenges and seeking support.
participant_1.background: I am bisexual. I live with my parents. I just lost my job and I am looking for something new. I think I might need help.

participant_2.name: Jessica
participant_2.personality: Optimistic and organized, enjoys balancing family life and work, always planning the next adventure.
participant_2.background: I work as a meeting coordinator. I live in upstate New York. I live with my husband and two children. I love to take road trips. My favorite place to visit is Seattle.
